name: HamisCounter
0:
”Alexa, open hamis counter”
”Alexa, open hamis counter and count from one to ten in spanish”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hamis counter
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can have Alexa count a maximum of 101 integers in one of the following languages: 
- brazilian, 
- english
- france
- german 
- hindi
- italian
- japanese 
- spanish

For example you can say "count in spanish from one to ten" and let Alexa count from one to ten in spanish.
You can count backward by saying "count from ten to one in german."
In addition, the counting voice can also be changed. 
When the language changes, the available voices are mentioned. 
For german these are Anna, Peter und Simone.
So if you say "Peter" then numbers are enumerated in german with the voice of Peter.
So if you say "Takara" then numbers are enumerated in japanes with the voice of Takara.

The assignment of the individual languages to the voices is:
Brazilian: Amanda, Pedro and Sophia.
German: Anna, Peter and Simone.
English with australian dialect: Cooper and Ruby.
British: Collin, Emily and Poppy.
English with indian dialect: Tamani.
American English: Abigail, Daisy, Donald, Layla, Lenny, Linda, Mary and Michael.
Spanish: Marta, Pablo and Valeria.
Spanish: with mexican dialect: Adriana.
Spanish: with american dialect: Alfonso, Gabriela and Mariana.
France: Angelique, Amelie and Leon.
France with canadian dialect: Anouk.
Hindi: Balu.
Italian: Enrico, Francesca and Luna.
Japanese: Takara and Taki.

Unfortunately, Alexa does not recognize the names of the voices well, so try several times if necessary

Maximum: 9223372036854775807
Minimum: -9223372036854775807
